attributes.review: i only downloaded this app out of respect because i felt bad about what happened at his tulsa rally and this is by far my the WORST app i ever downloaded. i opened the app to see a picture of an orange orangutan on the screen. i tried signing up and my screen kept glitching and freezing. i then went out of the app to try and fix the issue but it showed a picture and him getting a spray tan completely NAKED. i definitely do not recommend this app to anyone after this incredibly inappropriate experience.

attributes.title: Iâ€™ll never be the same
attributes.review: As soon as i downloaded this app, i very excitedly opened it to show any support i could against the haters. I was immediately hit in the face with what seems to be Cheeto dust. My eyes started burning â€˜one can only assume it was spicy Cheeto dustâ€™. I did my best to wash my eyes, but the after affects feel like Iâ€™m constantly getting stringy hairs from a balding man blown into my eyes. Iâ€™m having trouble walking up ramps, holding glasses of water and even worse... Iâ€™ve become attracted to my daughter. I would NOT recommend this app! Help!

attributes.title: This app made me ugly ğŸ‘ğŸ‘„ğŸ‘
attributes.review: So I wanted to worship the god Shrek you know. But then I see a an UGLY CHEETO!!! EWWW. The toxic thing made me barf and I started shrinking! Then I saw this yummy container with shrek on it so I munched on it. Then I became a block of concrete. I looked at my phone only to have the toxic fumes evaporate me. I was just being air so I go in a store to be air there. But I see a pack of Cheetos that had that weird sweaty Cheeto on it!! I was so disgusted and traumatized that I turned into lava and rolled home to smash my phone and I am texting this in a summoning circle to banish the Cheeto into Antarctica. BOO BAD APP EWW NEGATIVE ZERO STARS â­ï¸ YUCK

attributes.title: this app ruined my life
attributes.review: i love trump but this app is terrible. i might have to vote for biden because of this. this app took all of my information and then changed all of my passwords. i canâ€™t enter any account i have, and i canâ€™t even access my bank account. it probably took my money too. iâ€™m on the phone with my bank rn. AND it leaked my address and white supremacists are now trying to fight me. this app ruined my life. please donâ€™t download. i even emailed apple trying to get this app taken down. it is truly dangerous.
